summary: This is a brief email from the New Mexico Office of the Attorney General forwarding an attached letter to a recipient. The email itself contains no substantive details about the Epstein case, only serving as a cover note for an attachment.
keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 8, 2020, from the New Mexico Office of the Attorney General.
The email's purpose is to forward an attached PDF file named '7-8-2020_NMAGJetter_to_USAa.pdf'.
The body of the email contains no names, events, or specific information related to the Epstein case.
